titles.title: Congratulating the U.S. Equestrian Team on winning the Gold Medal in team show jumping in the Games of the XXIX Olympiad.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 9/18/2008--Introduced. Recognizes Laura Kraut, Beezie Madden, Will Simpson, and McLain Ward of the U.S. Equestrian Olympic Team on its Gold Medal in team show jumping and the achievements of all the members of the 2008 U.S. Olympic Team.
